summary: Applies random or fixed-size spatial cropping to one or more image tensors identified by keys, producing a configurable number of patch samples per input. Supports random or centered crop positions, variable ROI size ranges, and adds patch index metadata. Can operate lazily for deferred execution.
business_intent: Facilitates generation of diverse training patches from volumetric medical images, enabling data augmentation and efficient handling of large datasets in deep learning pipelines.
